query: query AllLemmas($inputValue: String!, $srcLangs: [String]!, $targetLangs: [String]!, $wantedDicts: [String]!, $after: String ) { stemList(first:100, search: $inputValue, srcLangs: $srcLangs, targetLangs: $targetLangs, wantedDicts: $wantedDicts after: $after ) { totalCount edges { node { stem srclangs targetlangs } } pageInfo { endCursor hasNextPage } } }
